title: Is WES evaluation needed for Canada PR? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes it is important to get your education credential assessment done before submitting your express entry profile. There are 5 organizations, in general, approved by Canada's immigration department. So you don't have to necessarily choose only WES, there are other options as well. Explore them, especially for getting a master's equivalence. I have attached a short video below to help you understand the process, requirements and organisations for ECA

Actually, Educational Credentials Assessment is mandatory(needed) for Canada PR not WES. WES is one of the 7 authorities who does evaluation/assessment of your Educational Credentials earned outside of Canada.
